SUB1.TITLE: Learn To Speak Germany
SUB1.TEXT: Learn how to speak proper Germany with a combination of our AI powered pronunciation exercises and dialogues made by our Germany experts. You can also try our conversation exercises and practice speaking with Germany speakers from our online community.

SUB2.TITLE: Teach Kids Or Adults
SUB2.TEXT: We offer both positions when you decide to teach from home with us. We offer a range lessons for two age groups of students, varying from conversational group classes to private and tailored one-to-one lessons.

SUB3.TITLE: Germany Online
SUB3.TEXT: Teaching Germany online is a great alternative to teaching abroad. The flexibility, comfort, and freedom gives teachers from the US and UK a chance to interact with international students while working from home.

REGISTER.TITLE: Create an Account
REGISTER.SUBTITLE: It's free and anyone can join!
REGISTER.WARN: An unverified account is deleted within a week.
